name: Emotional Speech Quality (MOS)
description: Mean Opinion Score evaluation of emotional speech synthesis quality and emotional expressiveness.

metrics.name: emotion_mos
metrics.definition: MOS for emotional speech quality (1-5 scale)

test_method: Synthesize speech with various emotions (happy, sad, angry, neutral, etc.). Listeners rate quality and identify perceived emotion.
notes: Emotional TTS evaluation requires careful control of text content and speaker characteristics. Cultural differences affect emotional expression and perception.
